description: This dashboard is to display the metrics from DCGM Exporter on a Kubernetes (1.13+) cluster

panels.title: Busy GPUs on All Selected Pods
Busy GPUs on Each Selected Pod

targets.expr: sum(rate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", cluster="", pod=~"${instance}"}[1m])) by (namespace, pod, interface)

panels.title: The rate of data (bytes/sec) received over TCP

targets.expr: sum(rate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", cluster="", pod=~"${instance}"}[1m])) by (namespace, pod, interface)

panels.title: The rate of data (bytes/sec) transmitted over TCP
The rate of data (bytes/sec) received over ROCE/GPU Direct RDMA
The rate of data (bytes/sec) transmitted over ROCE/GPU Direct RDMA
The fraction of time at least one warp was active on a SM, averaged over all SM
The Rate of Data (Bytes/sec) from device to host (DtoH)
The Rate of Data (Bytes/sec) from host to device (HtoD)
The rate of data(bytes/sec) transmitted  over NVLink, not including protocol headers
The rate of data (bytes/sec) received over NVLink, not including protocol headers
Total  Network Receive Traffic  in MB/s (sum on average)
Total  Network Transmit Traffic  in MB/s (sum on average)
Default Cluster Network - OCP Services + IO Traffic
GPU Pending Row-Remapping (Sum on a node, Expect 0)
# of GPU Failures on Nodes ( Expect  0)
Xid Errors from the Nvidia driver

title: OpenShift GPU Workloads
